fullplot: After twenty years in prison, Foley is finished with the grifter's life. When he meets an elusive young woman named Iris, the possibility of a new start looks real. But his past is proving to be a stubborn companion.
plot: After twenty years in prison, Foley is finished with the grifter's life. When he meets an elusive young woman named Iris, the possibility of a new start looks real. But his past is proving to be a stubborn companion.
title: The Samaritan

tomatoes.consensus: The Samaritan is a ludicrous neo-noir starring a seemingly bored Samuel L. Jackson.
